Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-01: On which mobile operating systems is your software or service supported?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-02: Describe or provide a reference to the application's architecture and functionality.

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-03: Is the application available from a trusted source (e.g., iTunes App Store, Android Market, BB World)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-04: Does the application store, process, or transmit critical data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-05: Is Institution's data encrypted in transport?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-06: Is Institution's data encrypted in storage? (e.g. disk encryption, at-rest)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-07: Does the mobile application support Kerberos, CAS, or Active Directory authentication?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-08: Will any of these systems be implemented on systems hosting the Institution's data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-09: Does the application adhere to secure coding practices (e.g. OWASP, etc.)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - Mobile Applications (v2.11)
Question: MAPP-10: Has the application been tested for vulnerabilities by a third party?

Question: MAPP-11: State the party that performed the vulnerability test and the date it was conducted?
